fields.name: Residential_Permit_Project_Details_Display
fields.fieldText:
Project Details

Provide us with additional details about the project by filling in the details below.

fields.name: Do_you_currently_occupy_the_property
fields.fieldText: Do you currently occupy the property?

fields.name: Will_you_occupy_the_dwelling_upon_completion
fields.fieldText: Will you occupy the dwelling upon completion or one year post completion?

fields.name: Are_you_increasing_the_footprint_of_the_structure
fields.fieldText: Are you increasing the footprint of the structure?

fields.name: DisplayText_WorkTypesRenovation
fields.fieldText: If Are you increasing the footprint of the structure = Yes then Renovation cannot be selected. Verbiage to be provided.

fields.name: DisplayText_WorkTypesRelocatedStructure
fields.fieldText: Relocated Structures require an Engineer Footing and Foundation Plan to be submitted.

fields.name: Are_you_are_licensed_general_contractor
fields.fieldText: Are you are licensed general contractor?

fields.name: General_Contractor_Is_Required_helper_text
fields.fieldText: General contractor is required by state law. Verbiage to be provided.

fields.name: HALT_Accessory
fields.fieldText: STOP! No Building Permit is required. Please apply for a Zoning Compliance Instead

fields.name: Will_there_be_an_additional_retaining_wall_for_the_Accessory
fields.fieldText: Will there be an additional retaining wall for the Accessory?

fields.name: Is_the_footprint_of_the_Accessory_Structure_12_or_less_in_all_directions
fields.fieldText: Is the footprint of the Accessory Structure 12' or less in all directions?

fields.name: Temporary_Power_helper_text
fields.fieldText: Temporary Power helper text goes here

fields.name: Does_the_lot_have_had_existing_water_and_sewer_service
fields.fieldText: Does the lot have/had existing water and sewer service?

fields.name: Is_this_property_located_in_a_Subdivision_under_construction
fields.fieldText: Is this property located in a Subdivision under construction?

fields.name: City_inspection_helper_text
fields.fieldText: If not in a subdivision under construction, the city needs to conduct an investigation, proper verbiage to follow
